name: St. Damien of Molokai
summary: Damien of Molokai was a Belgian priest and member of the Congregation of the Sacred Hearts of Jesus and Mary who volunteered to serve the leper colony on the Hawaiian island of Molokai. He spent 16 years caring for the physical and spiritual needs of the lepers, eventually contracting the disease himself and dying from it. He is the patron saint of lepers and outcasts.
keyQuotes: I am a leper among lepers.
